div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxj die mensis nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day Androw futhes grantit hm aving to Thome philp
xvj s' to be pait within terme of law

The saide day Androu futhes tuk to preiwe one monunday
that nixt cumis that thome philp is avande to him vj s' et j g'
of flaundris money lent to him befor the aldirman and balyeis

The saide day the ballieis ordanit Johne horne to pay tile
Anny andirsone the Relict of Richerde Waus xij s' vij d'
scottis money within viij dais quhilkis he grauntit aving to hir'
obefor

Eodem die thomas lammyntone conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore
Dauid menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis Raburne
et Idem Johannes conuictus de perturbio dicti thome Et si aliquis
ipsorum alterum perturbauerit in postrum et Inde conuictus fuerit
soluet xl s' fabrice ecclesie

The saide day Johne Keminty quyt of x s' follouit be
Jonet blinsele be ane Suorne assis' Dauid menyeis forsp
ekar

The saide day It was fundin be the saide assis' that Androw
lammyntone Is partismane with Alexander nory quhile fastirinevin'
that next Cumis

The saide day marioune Walcar' follouit Androu bavne for the wrang
uis' withthaldin fra hir of tua franche crovnis of golde four' schillingis
of Siluer and tua basane skinnis quhilkis the said' Androu opinly
denyit offering him tile vndirlie the determonacioun of ane assis' Ande in continent
thareftir the said' ctioun' was put to the determinacioun of ane assis' Ande in continent
quhilkis riplie auisit fande and deliuerit that the said' Androw sale pay
to the said' Marioun' fiwe schillingis vsuale money of Scotland'
and tua eln' of quhit clathtis be the moutht of Dauy menyeis
forspekar of the said' assis' quhilkis being pait he quyt of hir'
clame of the said' tya franche crovnis iiijor s' and tua basane skinnis

The said' day the aldirman and ballieis continevit the actioun debatabile
betuix Jonet Kintor and Johne malisoune Anent ane annuell Rent et cetera
quhil the law day eftir yule nixt hereftor the tenor of the actis
maid' tharapone Obefor

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiijo
die mensis Nouembris Anno quosupra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene vicesimoquarto die mensis Nouembris
Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto Coram honorabilibus viris
gilberto menyeis preposito Jacobo colisoune Johanne mar Johanne Ratre
et Alexandro gray balliuis dictj burgj in prestorio eiusdem protribunali sedentibus
videlicet Dauid menyeis Alexandrum Reid Johannem colisoun' thomam chavmer
thomam Waus patricium leslie thomam leslie Alexandrum mar Dauid mar'
Dauid steuart Alexandro malisoun' Alexandrum mathesoun' Dauid Kintor'
Willelmum Kintor Johannem moir' Johannem auchneyw et Andream stevinsoun'
burgenses dictj burgj Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus buchan
frater thome buchan' latoris presencium Obijt vltimo vestitus et Sasitus ut de feodo avj pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de terris subscriptis videlicet Jacente infra dictum bur
gum videlicet de duabus terris collateraliter Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam Robertj blinseill ex australi ex vna Et
terram patricij leslie ex boreali partibus ab altera Et communiones vias Regias ver
sus oriens et occidens Et de vna terra Interiore Jacente in le gastraw
ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram magistri Andree patersoun' ex
australi ex vna Et terram quondam Johannis Knollis ex boreali partibus
ab altera Et terram Willelmj portar versus oriens Et torrentem sine aque
ductum ad molendinum inferius versus occidens Et de vna terra anteriore
Jacente in vico castrj ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter terram Alexandrj
burnat et Orientali ex vna et terram gilbertj persoun' ex occidentali
partibus ab altera Et terram quondam Andree Ancroft versus austrum et
communionem viam Regiam versus boream Et de vna pecia terre Interioris dicti
tenementj Jacente inter dictam terram quondam Johannis murray ex australi ex vna Et
dictam terram Andree ancroft ex boreali partibus ab altera Et de
vno orto Jacente ad finem australem dictj tenementj inter communionem viam Regiam versus
boream Et torrentem sancte trinitatis versus austrum Et quod dictus
thomas est legittimis et propinquior heres dictj quondam Willelmum fratre suj de
dictis terris et Orto cum pertinenciis Et quod est legitime etatis Et quod dicte
terre et ortus cum pertinenciis valerit nunc per annum quatuor marcas et valuerunt
xl s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de suppremo domino
nostro Regis per seruicium burgagium Et dicte due terre collateraliter Ja
cente in vico furcarum Et dicta terra Jacente in le gastraw cum suis
pertinenciis nunc existit in manibus Agnetis strathachin Relicta quondam
dictj Willelmi sponsa sujin coniuncta infeodacione pro toto tempore vite sue Et quod
dicta terra anteriore pecia terre Interioris et ortiis cum suis pertinenciis Jacente
in vico castrj nunc existunt in manibus domini nostri Regis ob decessum
dictj quondam Willelmum fratris suj per spacium vnius mensis aut eocirca
In defectu verj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis datis

The said day the breiw of Richt Inpetrat' be Dauid mar'
anent the land debatable' betuix him and' the sistiris of vm
quhill Dauid club witht thar consent was continewit
to the law day eftir youyll but preiudice of ony party

The said day Johnne nicholsoun' sanstar was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
patry Rede forspekar for the strubulance of Alexander Ranisan Cordoner for
the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court And' to amend' as
law will And forbeir in tyme to cum And' the said Alexander quyt
of the stribulance of the siad' Johnne nicholsoun' et cetera

The said day philp belman be his avin toung graunt was in ane
amerciament of the court for the selling of ane apill for ane penny
quhar he micht haue sauld' thre for ane penny

The said day mastir Androue craufurd' one that ane part and'
Johnne Reid' perdoner one that vthir part was bundin and oblist
be thar handis vphaldin to stand' and' abid' at the deliuerance of
gilbert menyeis alderman Dauid menyeis and' patry Red' anent ale
debatis debatable betuix thame And' the said personis do to de
liuer betuix this and friday that nixt cummis et cetera

The said day the actioun' debatable betuix William Watsoun'
one that ane part and Dauid Kintor on that vthir part was
continewit to friday that nixt cummis but preiudice tile ony party

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdenne' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxvij die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra et cetera

Eodem die Johannes Rovbertsoun' fecit constituit crteauit nominauit et ordinauit
honorabilem virum magistrum Alexandrum Symsone canonicum Abirdonensis Rectore
de monemusk Alexandrum Reid' et magistrum Johannem giffart coniunctim et diuisim
suos veros legittimos et Indubitatos procuratores coniunctim et diuisim dans et concedens
eisdem ac eorum alterj ac suis substitutis pluribus aut vnj suam liberam
presentatem et mandatum speciale ad prosequendum sponsum Dauid fynne
Relictam patris Johannis Robertsoun' et districione et deuastacione terre
quondam dictj Johannis Jacente in vico furcarum quam habet Racione communitate
Infeodacionis eidem constituens pertinens Agendum defendendum Ceteram omnia
faciendum in vberiore forma dictum Rectorem suum legittimum et Indubitatem cessionarium
et assignatum in et quod dictam terram cum pertinenciis Ipsumque Jure suo
substituit et Imposuit in vberiore forma cessionis et assignis qua fierj
poterit cum extensione notarij Et inde dictus dominus Rector pecijt Intrumentum
Acta erant hec in dicto pretorio hora quasi x' ante merediem Testibus gilberto
menyes preposito Jacobo colisoun' Johanne Ratre balliuis magister Johanne
giffart Johanne cummin thoma Wod' Richardo Waus Willelmo myln'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in preto
rio eiusdem vicesimo octauo die mensis Nouembris
Anno Quo Supra et cetera

The said day Dauid Ruthirfurd' was conuict be ane suorne assis'
Johnne colisoun forspekar for the stribulance of Johnne arthour'
for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and' to
amend as law will and' forbeir in tyme tocum And' the said'
Johnne quit of ale stribulance of the said Dauid

The said day Williame litill Johnne was quyt be ane suorne assis'
Johnne moir forspekar for the wranguis' Intrometing of ane meyr
clamyt be Dauid Kintor et cetera

The said' day Dauy Ruthirfurd was conuict be ane suorne assis'
Johne Colysone forspekar for trubulance of Johne arthour' Ande
the saide Johne quyt of trubulance of the said Dauy

The saide day Androw stratone was conuict be ane suorne assis'
Johne Colisone forspekar for trubulance of Dauy futhes for the
quhilk he was in ane Amerciament of the Court and tile amend' as
law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum Ande the saide Dauy quyt
of ale trubulance of the saide Androw Ande atour the assis' orda
nit
the saide Androu to pay ane li' of wax to the haly blud' licht
and tile ask the said' Dauy forgivnes in the Court Ande becaus'
the saide Androw was obstinant and wald' nocht ask the saide
Dauy forgivnes eftir the deliuerance of the saide assis' at commavnd'
of the balyeis he was accusit for trubulance and dissobeing of the
Court for the quhilkis It was ordanit that he suld' ask the
said' Dauy to the balyeis forgivnes and to pay ane vthir li' of
wax to the haly blud' licht Ande gif euere he committis sic falt
in tyme to Cum and beis counictit tharof he sal pay xl s' to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday the first day of the
monetht of December' next to Cum to Sandy symsone tile ansuer'
to the borghe fundin one him be Dauy Anthone that he Is his
feit seruand' and aucht to mak him seruice

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
primo die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The said' day thir personis vndir writin Alexander Rede Johne Colison
Androw Cullane Duncan Colisone thomas chamer thomas Waus
William futhes Jonhne blak Androw litster Jonhne grig thome
Watsone Androw steuinsone and Johne andirson' burges of the said'
burghe chosin and Suorne in ane assis' 'at commavnd' of the
aldirman and balyeis fand' and deliuerit that that the land' that marioune balcrome
spous' of vmquhile Johne Robertsone and now to Dauy
fynne has in coniunctifeftment liand' in the gallougat Is
war' tene pundis in sclatis tymmer lofting durris and wallis
thane sene the tyme scho Intromettit with the said' lande

The saide day Sandy symsone grauntit him feit seruand' to
cristy prat for foure yeris Immediatlie hereftir to be Runnyn he
gifand' to him mett and clatht according to him

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
thomas leslie forspekar that Williame scrogis Is aving to
bessy Cullane the spous' of Johne of balcromy half ane
barrell of girls' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law

The saide day bessy Cullane the spous' of Johne balcrome
assignit to Johne of Kennerty the half barrell of girls' aving
to hir be Williame scrogis In part of pament of the Rest
of tua barrellis of Salmond' quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay to the said' Johne within terme of law

The saide day Donald' baxstar grantit him awande to sere Johne'
of Stirueling vj s' viij d' quhilk he suld' pay him or gar him
be payt within terme of law

The said' day the actioun' debatabile betuix Anny strathachin
the Relict of vmquhile Williame of buchane one that ane part
and thomas thi buchane his brothir and ayr one that vthir part
anent ane maser and Ane Ring clamyt of airschip Is continevit
be the aldirman and Counsale to the law day nixt eftir yule
hereftir follouing

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis Decembris
Anno quo supra et cetera

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod Willelmus still est legitimus et
propinquior heres quondam Alexandri still patris suj et cetera

add.foreign: abbatis de bonacord et non equitans

div.p:
The said day the alderman and' bailyes assignit the law day eftir youyll
nixt hereftir to the personis that the abbot of bonacord' was plantius' one
quhilkis Raid nocht at sanct Nicholes' mes' to decoir' the toune to ansuer'
tharanent And' ordanit William scrimgeour Officiar' to warn' the
said' personis to the said day

add.foreign: dominus Thomas Wricht et magister Robertus

div.p:
The said' day the bailyes assignit monunday that nixt cummis to
Dauy tailyour to ansueir at the Instance of sere thomas Wricht
and' mastir Robert masoun' for the wranguis' withthaldin of thar
govnis quhilkis he tuk to mak

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis
Decembris Anno quo supra et cetera

Eodem die archebaldus Wobstar conuictus fuit per confessionem lingue proprie pro
perturbio curie et emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera

Eodem die Archebaldus Wobstar conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis ruthirfurd'
militis pro perturbio cristinj Jamesone et Idem cristinus pro perturbio dicti Archebaldi et dictus
Archebaldus notator pro perturbio dict Insuper thomas pyll pro perturbio cristinum Jameson'
et quilibet alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day Katherine thekar was conuict be ane Suorne assis' sere Johne
ruthirfurd' forspekar for strubulance of the spous' of the wif of Absolon' Ande
scho conuict for trubulance of the said' Katherine And' atour the assis'
ordanit the saide Katherine to haue the yarne quhilk scho spane to the
said' woman hame to hir hous' and Resaue hir' pament for hir' labour'

The said' day It was ordanit be the assis' that Johne frostar sale ples'
sandy Setone for his govne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day Williame Walcar' grantit him aving to Dauy stevart
four' pundis vsuale money of Scotland' and to wyrk to him tene schillingis
wortht of labour' to be pait fourtj schillingis at witsonday nixt
hereftir and fourty schillingis at michaelmes' thareftir and to do the labour'
quhen euire It ples' the said' day

The said' day Androw fif grantit him avand to Dauy stevart
xlij s' money of Scotland to be pait viij dais eftir pasche
next hereftir Ande falyeing tharof to pay to the said' Dauy ane
barrele of Salmond' Sufficient merchand gud' at the fest of witsonday
Sanct Johne the baptist callit mydsomer next thaireftir follouing

The said' day the borghe' fundin one Symon ellon' be Alexander
burnat for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of vj s' was
fundin of nayn' availe be ane suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar
for the quhilkis the saide Alexander was in ane Amerciament of the Court

The said' day iIt was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
patry leslie forspekar that Dauy talyour' sal pay to sere thomas
Wricht aucht schillingis Ilkan eln' of clatht that wantis of
his schapin govne quhilkis he resauit fra the said' sere thomas
to mak and was stollin' out of his butht And' that thai personis
be chosin suorne and considdir the skatht done to mastir Robert mason'
Anent the part of his ald' govn' stollin fra the said Dauy and
the said' Dauy to recompens' and pay the samyn to the said' mastir
Robert

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxijo
die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid Auchone conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid
menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio cristoforj prat Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt et Idem cristoferus conuict pro perturbio prefati Dauid Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt et quilibet ipsorum soluet ad lumen sancti Sanguinis vnam
li' cere Insuper diliberatum fuit per dictam assisam quod si prefatus Dauid
Auchone eundum cristoferum seu antiquem alium de carnificio de Abirdene perturbauerit soluet
xl s' monete scocie fabrice dicte ecclesie sine remissione

Eodem die Alexander nory deuenit plegius legalis per ostendem manus sue
dextere quod Dauid Anthone erit Indempnes pro cristoforo prat
aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes vschear deuenit plegius legalis
per ostendem manus sue quod dictus cristorus erit Indempnis pro dicto
Dauid aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet ipsorum obligatur ad rele
uandum suos plegios de huismodi submissione

The said' day Johne of meldrum Oblist him be the fathe of his
bodie to content and pay to gilbert menyeis aldirman tua barrellis
of Salmond' Sufficient merchand' gude of the Richtuis' bynd'
of abirdene at the fest of Natiuite of Sanct Johne the bap
tist Callit mydsommir' next hereftir follouing or within xv
dais thareftir but fraude or gile

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem legittimam Curie quod Johannes Waus
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Andree Waus patris suj burgensis dicti burgi
